title: Exploring the influence of slaughterhouse type and slaughtering steps on Campylobacter jejuni contamination in chicken meat: A cluster analysis approach
content:
Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Chalita Jainonthee, Warangkhana Chaisowwong, Phakamas Ngamsanga, Tongkorn Meeyam, Fernando Sampedro, Scott J. Wells, Duangporn Pichpol
